parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the interactive messaging application.

parameters.name: Data
parameters.description: The message body. The value is a JSON string.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the message group.

parameters.name: OperatorUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user who performed the operation.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the message. A value that is less than or equal to 10000 specifies a system message. A value that is greater than 10000 specifies a custom message.
